//www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush contact me at sherricrochets@gmail com basic character doll pattern difficulty medium i assume you already know how to crochet how to crochet in the round how to read a pattern and how to sew pieces together supplies size g hook will make approx 9 - 10 doll or around the size of a barbie doll yarn use red heart super saver or similar small amounts of each  colors of your choice or feel free to use any colors you like gauge is unimportant for this project terms single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch increase = increase two single_crochet in same stitch decrease = decrease crochet two stitches together work even = single_crochet in each single_crochet around ch1 t = chain 1 turn blo = back loops only flo = front loops only note this doll is worked in the round i join rounds and i single_crochet in the same space as joining so i m assuming that at the end of each round you are slip stitching to the first stitch of that round and that you chain 1 to start the next round you can work in spirals if that s easier for you just remember to mark your rounds you want your stitches tight and close together so the stuffing doesn t show through later on to start each piece you can chain 2 and work your 6 stitches into the 2nd stitch from the hook or you can use the magic adjustable loop which you can easily find by using google page 2 of 9 copyright sherri bush ~ sherri crochets & crafts http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush contact me at sherricrochets@gmail com the legs and body row instructions
